short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that help with adding twitter trend to posts

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Description:
TTrends is a powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your Twitter experience by providing quick access to trending topics and facilitating easy sharing. Whether you're a social media enthusiast, content creator, or researcher, TTrends simplifies the process of extracting and sharing Twitter trends.
Key Features:

Effortless Trend Extraction: TTrends seamlessly extracts trending topics from your Twitter feed, making it easy for you to stay informed about the latest discussions.

Quick Clipboard Sharing: With just a click, TTrends copies the extracted trends to your clipboard, allowing you to share them instantly in your tweets, articles, or research.

Dynamic Icon Notifications: TTrends dynamically changes its icon based on the success or failure of the trend extraction process, providing visual feedback to the user.

Intuitive Tooltip Notifications: Receive tooltip notifications indicating the success or failure of the trend extraction, ensuring a smooth user experience.
How to Use:

Click the Icon: Simply click on the TTrends icon in your Chrome browser to initiate the trend extraction process.

Instant Extraction: TTrends will quickly extract the current Twitter trends and display a visual indicator of success or failure.

Copy to Clipboard: If successful, click the icon again to copy the trends to your clipboard, ready for sharing.

Dynamic Icon Updates: Experience dynamic icon updates based on the success or failure of the trend extraction process.

Smart Notifications: Receive tooltip notifications for easy status updates on the extraction process.

Follow us on https://twitter.com/olamarvelcreate  for the latest updates, tips, and support.

Note:
TTrends is designed for Twitter enthusiasts who want to streamline their trend-sharing experience. Please make sure to grant the necessary permissions for the extension to function optimally.

Thank you for choosing TTrends - Your go-to Twitter Trends companion!
